00010 #include "CColoredListBox.h"
00011 
00012 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 void CColoredListBox::DrawItem
00023     (
00024     LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT aDrawItem
00025     )
00026 {
00027     CDC dc;
00028     CRect rcItem( aDrawItem->rcItem );
00029     UINT nIndex = aDrawItem->itemID;
00030     if( (int)nIndex >= 0 )
00031     {
00032         COLORREF rgbBkGnd;
00033         COLORREF rgbText;
00034         CString  itemText;
00035         CString  compareText;
00036 
00037         GetText( nIndex, itemText );
00038         compareText = itemText;
00039         compareText = compareText.MakeLower();
00040 
00041         if( aDrawItem->itemState & ODS_SELECTED )
00042         {
00043             rgbBkGnd = ::GetSysColor( COLOR_HIGHLIGHT );
00044             rgbText = ::GetSysColor( COLOR_HIGHLIGHTTEXT );
00045         }
00046         else if( !mSearchString.IsEmpty() && compareText.Find( mSearchString, 0 ) != -1 )
00047         {
00048             rgbBkGnd = RGB( 255, 255, 0 );  // yellow
00049             rgbText = RGB( 0, 0, 0 );       // black
00050         }
00051         else
00052         {
00053             rgbBkGnd = RGB( 255, 255, 255 ); // white
00054             rgbText = RGB( 0, 0, 0 );        // black
00055         }
00056         dc.Attach( aDrawItem->hDC );
00057 
00058         if( aDrawItem->itemState & ODS_FOCUS )
00059             dc.DrawFocusRect( rcItem );
00060 
00061         CBrush br( rgbBkGnd );
00062         dc.FillRect( rcItem, &br );
00063         dc.SetBkColor( rgbBkGnd );
00064         dc.SetTextColor( rgbText );
00065         dc.TextOut( rcItem.left + 2, rcItem.top + 2, itemText );
00066 
00067         dc.Detach();
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 CString CColoredListBox::getSearchString() const
00076 {
00077     return mSearchString;
00078 }
00079 
00080 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 void CColoredListBox::setSearchString( CString aSearchString )
00085 {
00086     mSearchString = aSearchString;
00087     mSearchString.MakeLower();
00088 }
